commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to C Gayle. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to C Gayle. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Gayle smashes it through square leg, and RCB are underway!

message.text: Four! Gayle smashes it through square leg, and RCB are underway!

commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to C Gayle, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to C Gayle, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]Gayle's not hanging about! Launches it over long on! This could all be over in even quicker time than first expected!

message.text: Six! Gayle's not hanging about! Launches it over long on! This could all be over in even quicker time than first expected!

commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to C Gayle, %SPEED% short length on middle stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to C Gayle, %SPEED% short length on middle stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length just outside off stump. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! The captain joins in! Flicked over mid-wicket, and it runs away for four

message.text: Four! The captain joins in! Flicked over mid-wicket, and it runs away for four

commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Close! Kohli mistimes this, but deep mid-wicket can't quite get round

message.text: Close! Kohli mistimes this, but deep mid-wicket can't quite get round

commentaries.bbcode: D Steyn to V Kohli, no run, %SPEED% full toss on off stump. He doesn't offer a shot
commentaries.autoText: D Steyn to V Kohli, no run, %SPEED% full toss on off stump. He doesn't offer a shot

commentaries.bbcode: Well, that was a tad interesting first over! 64 required off 30. It really is anyone's game! Bhuvi Kumar will open from the other end.

message.text: Well, that was a tad interesting first over! 64 required off 30. It really is anyone's game! Bhuvi Kumar will open from the other end.

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Four! That's not possible! The most ridiculous leading edge nearly goes for six over third man! RCB won't care though!

message.text: Four! That's not possible! The most ridiculous leading edge nearly goes for six over third man! RCB won't care though!

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle. He hits a nice boundary
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle. He hits a nice boundary

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Gayle's swinging like he's trying to blow the hinges off a gate! Smacks it through mid-wicket for four more

message.text: Four! Gayle's swinging like he's trying to blow the hinges off a gate! Smacks it through mid-wicket for four more

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle, no run. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle, no run. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length on middle stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]That's a monster! Flies over mid-wicket! RCB are cruising this!

message.text: Six! That's a monster! Flies over mid-wicket! RCB are cruising this!

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length going down leg. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length going down leg. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Four! Bhuvi fires in a yorker, and Gayle places this between square leg and short fine leg. This is much more fun than a full T20!

message.text: Four! Bhuvi fires in a yorker, and Gayle places this between square leg and short fine leg. This is much more fun than a full T20!

commentaries.bbcode: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: B Kumar to C Gayle, %SPEED% full length outside off stump. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]This is just getting silly! Gayle's smashed this one over cover. Is this actually possible?! So much entertainment!

message.text: Six! This is just getting silly! Gayle's smashed this one over cover. Is this actually possible?! So much entertainment!

commentaries.bbcode: 40 off 24. In a normal match, that'd be a reasonable target for both sides. Could all be over with in the next 2 overs!

message.text: 40 off 24. In a normal match, that'd be a reasonable target for both sides. Could all be over with in the next 2 overs!

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to V Kohli, no run, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to V Kohli, no run, %SPEED% short length outside off stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Close! Swing and a miss from Kohli. Ladies and gentlemen, we have a dot ball!

message.text: Close! Swing and a miss from Kohli. Ladies and gentlemen, we have a dot ball!

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length going down leg. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to C Gayle, Wide delivery
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to C Gayle, Wide delivery

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to C Gayle, [b]WICKET!!! C Gayle is out[/b] c Shikhar Dhawan b Moises Henriques
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to C Gayle, WICKET!!! C Gayle is out c Shikhar Dhawan b Moises Henriques

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] That is massive! Gayle has slapped that straight to Dhawan at deep mid-wicket. The crowd have gone utterly ballistic!

message.text: Wicket! That is massive! Gayle has slapped that straight to Dhawan at deep mid-wicket. The crowd have gone utterly ballistic!

commentaries.bbcode: It won't get any easier for the SRH bowlers - AB de Villiers is striding to the crease!

message.text: It won't get any easier for the SRH bowlers - AB de Villiers is striding to the crease!

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to AB de Villiers, [b]WICKET!!! AB de Villiers is out[/b] c Dale Steyn b Moises Henriques
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to AB de Villiers, WICKET!!! AB de Villiers is out c Dale Steyn b Moises Henriques

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Wicket![/b] Moises, you utter beauty! AB has swatted this straight to long on. The crowd can't control themselves!

message.text: Wicket! Moises, you utter beauty! AB has swatted this straight to long on. The crowd can't control themselves!

commentaries.bbcode: Henriques is on a hat-trick. This game is turning out to be almost indescribable!

message.text: Henriques is on a hat-trick. This game is turning out to be almost indescribable!

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to V Kohli. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to V Kohli. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: M Henriques to M Singh, no run. He doesn't offer a shot
commentaries.autoText: M Henriques to M Singh, no run. He doesn't offer a shot

commentaries.bbcode: What an over by Henriques! He'll have the keys to Hyderabad if SRH go on and win this! 37 off 18 required as Karn Sharma comes on to bowl.

message.text: What an over by Henriques! He'll have the keys to Hyderabad if SRH go on and win this! 37 off 18 required as Karn Sharma comes on to bowl.

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length on leg stump. He picks up two
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length on leg stump. He picks up two

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He picks up a single
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He picks up a single

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to M Singh, %SPEED% short length on leg stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to M Singh, %SPEED% short length on leg stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Close! Kohli hits this high in the air, but Karn can't get close enough to take the catch chasing it

message.text: Close! Kohli hits this high in the air, but Karn can't get close enough to take the catch chasing it

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length on off stump. He plays and misses
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% good length on off stump. He plays and misses

commentaries.bbcode: Kohli's asked for a change in bats. They need a boundary off this ball.

message.text: Kohli's asked for a change in bats. They need a boundary off this ball.

commentaries.bbcode: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way
commentaries.autoText: K Sharma to V Kohli, %SPEED% short length going down leg. He hits a great shot, that has gone all the way

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Six! [/b]It's gone over long on! This game continues to take another twist and turn! Kohli dances down the track and it goes all the way.

message.text: Six! It's gone over long on! This game continues to take another twist and turn! Kohli dances down the track and it goes all the way.

commentaries.bbcode: 23 off 12. PK will bowl one surely, but who will bowl the other over?

message.text: 23 off 12. PK will bowl one surely, but who will bowl the other over?

commentaries.bbcode: P Kumar to M Singh, [b]WICKET!!! M Singh is out[/b] c Eoin Morgan b Praveen Kumar
commentaries.autoText: P Kumar to M Singh, WICKET!!! M Singh is out c Eoin Morgan b Praveen Kumar
